item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Maddock Films set for horror comedy universe with 8 films lined up from 2025 to 2028; Shakti Shalini & Chamunda are 2 new entrants - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Maddock Films Announces Ambitious Horror Comedy Universe with 8 Films from 2025 to 2028

Publication Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Maddock Films is setting the stage for an interconnected horror-comedy superhero universe over the next four years, introducing eight films from 2025 to 2028, including new titles Thama, Shakti Shalini, and Chamunda.

  • 2025 will see the release of Thama on Diwali and Shakti Shalini on December 31.
  • 2026 will bring Bhediya 2 on August 14 and Chamunda on December 4.
  • 2027 will feature Stree 3 on August 13 and Mahamunjya on December 24.
  • 2028 will culminate in the releases of Pehla Mahayudh on August 11 and Doosra Mahayudh during the Diwali period on October 18.
“Our mission at Maddock has always been to innovate and entertain... a cinematic universe that brings unforgettable characters and their stories to life like never before.” - Dinesh Vijan

Maddock Films aims to reshape the future of Hindi cinema by blending heritage with innovation through its ambitious horror-comedy universe.

item.title: Game Changer trailer: Impactful with solid visuals and Ram Charan’s mass avatar - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer trailer: Impactful with solid visuals and Ram Charan’s mass avatar

Published on Jan 2, 2025 by OTT

The day Ram Charan fans have been waiting for is finally here, as the Game Changer team launched the theatrical trailer. Directed by Shankar, this political action drama has been produced on a massive budget and is packed with solid commercial elements.

  • The trailer showcases Ram Charan in various avatars, confirming his mass appeal.
  • Shankar aims to reclaim his reputation following criticisms of previous projects.
  • The trailer hints at a strong storyline and features notable actors such as Anjali, SJ Suryah, and Srikanth.
Ram Charan seems to have got a role with multiple shades just like that of RRR.

The anticipation for Ram Charan’s performance is at an all-time high after this trailer launch.

item.title: Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024

Publication Date: 2024
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The year 2024 has seen a wide range of box office performances in Bollywood, with films classified from All Time Blockbusters to Disasters based on their earnings. Notably, Munjiya stands out as a Super Hit while Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan disappoints as a Disaster.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 has earned approximately Rs. 769.75 cr., making it an All Time Blockbuster.
  • Stree 2 became one of the biggest hits with Rs. 627.02 cr.
  • Munjya emerged as a sleeper hit, crossing Rs. 100 cr.
  • Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan was classified as a Disaster with earnings of only Rs. 59.17 cr.
Pushpa 2: The Rule has raked in more than any other film this year.

Overall, the classification system aids in understanding the economic landscape and viewer preferences in Bollywood.

item.title: Box Office New Year Record: Aamir Khan Dominates Top 10 List, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Strikes Shah Rukh Khan & Prabhas! - Koimoi
item.description:
Box Office New Year Record: Aamir Khan Dominates Top 10 List, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Strikes Shah Rukh Khan

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun started the new year strongly as Pushpa 2 earned 10 crore INR on its 28th day of release, making it one of the top 10 collections for a Hindi film on January 1.

  • Pushpa 2 makes 10 crore INR on January 1, 2025, ranking 8th in the top 10 first-day January box office collections.
  • Allu Arjun's film surpassed Shah Rukh Khan’s Dunki and Prabhas's Salaar, both of which had a box-office clash on December 21, 2023.
  • Aamir Khan leads the top 10 list with four films, including Dangal, PK, 3 Idiots, and Dhoom 3.
“Pushpa 2 earned 63% more than its predecessor on the same day.”

This new achievement contributes significantly to Allu Arjun's standing in the industry while Aamir Khan continues to dominate the box office rankings.

item.title: After Bollywood's biggest dud The Lady Killer, Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar Reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 by: Devansh Sharma

Actors Arjun Kapoor, Bhumi Pednekar, and Rakul Preet Singh will share the screen in a film titled "Mere Husband Ki Biwi" after their previous collaboration in the poorly received film "The Lady Killer".

  • The upcoming film is set to be released on February 21, 2025.
  • A playful announcement on Instagram describes the film's love story as unique: "Yahaan pyaar ki geometry thodi twisted hai - kyunki ye love triangle nahi, pura circle hai!"
  • The film will be directed by Mudassar Aziz, known for his work on films like "Khel Khel Mein" and "Pati Patni Aur Woh".
  • The film's producers include Vashu Bhagnani, Jackky Bhagnani, and Deepshikha Deshmukh.
  • Arjun and Bhumi's last film, "The Lady Killer," was a commercial failure, earning only ₹60,000 against a budget of ₹45 crore.
“It's lighthearted, relatable, and full of moments that will stay with you long after you leave the theater,” said director Mudassar Aziz.

In summary, the reunion of Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar aims to create a better reception from audiences, following their last film's disappointing performance.

item.title: Identity Review | Tovino Thomas Starrer Is Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Identity Review | Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Lensmen Reviews

The review discusses the latest film 'Identity', highlighting both its ambitious scope and intricate plot that tends to overcomplicate a seemingly simple story.

  • The story revolves around Haran Shankar, a character with an abusive past and unique skills as a sketch artist.
  • As Haran interacts with his police officer neighbor and a witness with face blindness, the narrative unfolds in unexpected ways.
  • The film is noted for its detailed research but suffers from excessive exposition that diminishes the impact of plot twists.
  • Director’s choices in cinematography and pacing received praise, especially during action sequences.
  • The review suggests that the film's ambitions could have benefited from a more refined screenplay.
“A bit more refinement on a writing level would have made Identity a quality film by all means.”

In conclusion, while 'Identity' showcases ambitious filmmaking and intriguing concepts, its overly complicated storyline ultimately detracts from the viewer's experience.

item.title: Ranveer Singh as Sardar in LEAKED photos from the sets of Aditya Dhar’s film leaves netizens impressed - Bollywood Hungama

item.title: Armaan Malik ties the knot with Aashna Shroff; wedding photos go viral! - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Armaan Malik Ties the Knot with Aashna Shroff; Wedding Photos Go Viral!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Popular singer Armaan Malik has recently married influencer Aashna Shroff, with their wedding photos quickly circulating online.

  • Armaan Malik, known for his extensive vocal work in Bollywood, has wed Aashna Shroff.
  • The couple's wedding ceremony was shared widely across social media platforms.
  • Fans and celebrities alike are congratulating the newlyweds.
“It feels surreal to marry my best friend,” said Armaan Malik.

This wedding marks a significant moment in both celebrity lives, bringing together the worlds of music and social media influence.

item.title: SSMB 29 launch: SS Rajamouli's film with Mahesh Babu kicks off with pooja amid confusion over Priyanka Chopra's casting - Hindustan Times
item.description:
SS Rajamouli's SSMB 29 Launch with Mahesh Babu Amid Casting Confusion

Publication Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The highly anticipated film directed by SS Rajamouli and starring Mahesh Babu was officially launched with a pooja ceremony in Hyderabad.

  • SSMB 29 is Mahesh Babu’s 29th film, marking a significant collaboration.
  • The launch took place at the Aluminium Factory and was attended by key team members.
  • Confusion surrounds Priyanka Chopra’s potential casting in the film, with no official confirmation yet.
  • The film is expected to be an action-adventure drama, potentially shot in locations including Kenya.
Rajamouli during a screening of RRR: “His name is Mahesh Babu, he is a Telugu actor. Hopefully, we finish the film a little bit fast.”

This launch marks an exciting phase for Mahesh Babu and fans are eager for more details about the project.

item.title: Made for ₹160 crore, earned just ₹47 crore, how Varun Dhawan's Baby John became 2024's final box office disaster - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan's Baby John: 2024's Final Box Office Disaster

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan starrer, Baby John, has failed to impress at the box office, earning only ₹47 crore against its ₹160 crore budget. Despite high expectations due to its mass action genre, the film opened poorly and received negative reviews.

  • Released with a budget of ₹160 crore, Baby John has grossed just ₹47 crore globally.
  • The film opened to a disappointing ₹12 crore on its first day.
  • Negative reviews and poor word of mouth contributed to its decline in viewership.
  • Trade insiders predict total losses could reach ₹100 crore.
“Baby John fell the hardest. Its failure may cause Bollywood makers to realize that merely formula will not help a film soar if everything else is hollow.”

This film represents a significant failure for Varun Dhawan and may signal a need for change in the Bollywood mass action genre.

item.title: Singer Armaan Malik gets married to social media influencer Aashna Shroff. See first photos - The Indian Express
item.description:
Singer Armaan Malik Gets Married to Aashna Shroff: First Photos Shared

Publication Date: [Insert Publication Date] | Source: Indian Express

Singer Armaan Malik, known for his hit songs, has tied the knot with social media influencer Aashna Shroff in a private ceremony attended by close friends and family. The couple wore matching peach outfits and shared heartfelt moments on social media.

  • Armaan Malik shared his wedding photos on Instagram.
  • The couple has been together since 2017, and their engagement was announced in October 2023.
  • Armaan expressed his love by saying, "Tu hi mera Ghar (You are my home)," which is also the title of his new single.
  • Congratulations from fans and celebrities flooded social media.
“My heart is so full, I’m crying.” - A Fan

In conclusion, Armaan Malik’s recent marriage marks a joyful milestone in his life, celebrated by loved ones and fans alike.

item.title: SSMB29: SS Rajamouli, Mahesh Babu kickstart their 'Globe Trotting' jungle adventure film with pooja ceremony; WATCH - PINKVILLA
item.description:
SSMB29: SS Rajamouli, Mahesh Babu kickstart their 'Globe Trotting' jungle adventure film with pooja ceremony; WATCH

Published on: January 2, 2025  |  Source: Pinkvilla

The much-anticipated film SSMB29, directed by SS Rajamouli and starring Mahesh Babu, has officially begun with a pooja ceremony in Hyderabad.

  • The pooja ceremony took place on January 2, 2025.
  • Priyanka Chopra has been confirmed as the female lead in the film.
  • The script is in its final stages, with filming expected to commence in April 2025.
  • Prithviraj Sukumaran is set to play the antagonist alongside Mahesh Babu.
  • SS Rajamouli plans for the film to be a two-part saga, with the first part targeted for release in 2027 and the second part in 2029.
  • Rajamouli intends to blend elements of thrill into the film.
“The film is in the final stages of writing, and is all set to go on floors in April 2025.”

The commencement of SSMB29 marks a significant milestone for both Mahesh Babu and director SS Rajamouli, generating excitement among fans for what promises to be an epic cinematic experience.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Vivian Dsena breaks down in tears as Nouran brings his daughter Layan in the house - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Vivian Dsena breaks down in tears as Nouran brings his daughter Layan in the house

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

In a poignant moment on Bigg Boss 18, actor Vivian Dsena was overwhelmed with emotion when his daughter Layan was brought into the house by Nouran, bringing tears to his eyes.

  • Vivian Dsena displayed a heartfelt reaction as he embraced his daughter.
  • The moment highlighted the emotional ties between family and contestants.
  • The audience praised the show's attempt to humanize reality TV contestants.
“This is the strongest emotional moment I’ve ever seen on the show.”

The moment serves as a reminder of the personal stories behind the contestants in the competitive environment of reality television.

item.title: Fans call Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Diljit Dosanjh’s ‘memorable meeting’ the ‘first unexpected col - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Fans call PM Modi and Diljit Dosanjh’s meeting the ‘first unexpected collaboration of 2025’

Publication Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Times of India

The New Year dawned with an unexpected yet memorable meeting between Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and global icon Diljit Dosanjh, sparking excitement on social media.

  • Diljit Dosanjh celebrated the start of 2025 with a meeting with PM Modi.
  • The meeting was shared on social media, highlighting their warm interaction.
  • PM Modi praised Diljit, emphasizing the pride of seeing talent from small beginnings shine globally.
  • Diljit expressed his realization of India's greatness through his travels.
  • The joint post received an enthusiastic response, with fans dubbing it the 'first unexpected collaboration of 2025.'
“When a boy from a small village in 'Hindustan' shines on the global stage, it feels amazing.” - PM Modi
“A fantastic start to 2025. A very memorable meeting with PM @narendramodi Ji.” - Diljit Dosanjh

This heartwarming interaction highlights the blend of music, culture, and the importance of recognizing the human connections behind public figures.

item.title: These two CBFC objections for Game Changer raise questions - 123telugu
item.description:
These two CBFC objections for Game Changer raise questions

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 Source: 123telugu.com

The grand arrival of Game Changer, a highly anticipated political drama directed by Shankar Shanmugam, is just around the corner, set to release on January 10, 2025.

  • The movie has been granted a U/A certificate by the CBFC with a runtime of 2 hours and 45 minutes.
  • CBFC objections include the requirement for the movie's title to be presented in Telugu and the exclusion of the honorific 'Padmasree' before Brahmanandam's name.
  • The concerns prompt questions about inconsistencies with previous films like Prabhas’ Kalki 2898 AD.
  • The objections may relate to past controversies surrounding the misuse of award titles by actors, including a directive from the Andhra Pradesh High Court.
“It remains to be seen who will provide clarity on these matters.”

As the film's release approaches, the clarity regarding these objections is eagerly awaited by audiences.

item.title: Squid Game Season 3 update: Netflix accidentally drops release date, fans have theories - The Economic Times
item.description:
Squid Game Season 3 Update: Netflix Accidentally Drops Release Date, Fans Have Theories

Publication Date: Not provided

Source: Economic Times

Squid Game fans were thrilled with news of a potential release date for the highly anticipated third season, accidentally unveiled by Netflix Korea through a teaser video.

  • Netflix Korea mistakenly revealed June 27, 2025, as the release date for Season 3.
  • A teaser video showed Young-hee from the game meeting a new character, Chul-soo, raising speculations about new game dynamics.
  • Fans reacted mixedly, with some wishing the series had ended after the first season.
  • Rumors about a cameo by Leonardo DiCaprio were debunked by Netflix.
“Young-Hee & Chul-Su. Season 3, coming in 2025. Only on Netflix.”

The hype for Squid Game Season 3 remains high, fueled by fan theories and anticipation, despite Netflix's official confirmation still pending.

item.title: Boney Kapoor says Allu Arjun was 'unnecessarily dragged' into Pushpa 2 stampede case: 'It was only because of the crowd' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Boney Kapoor has said that it was wrong to drag Allu Arjun in the Sandhya Theatre stampede case, adding that the death of the fan happened due to the crowd.

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Boney Kapoor defended Telugu star Allu Arjun concerning his legal troubles following a tragic stampede that resulted in a fan's death at the premiere of Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Boney Kapoor criticized the allegations against Allu Arjun, asserting they were unfounded.
  • He emphasized that the tragedy was due to the overwhelming crowd and not Arjun's actions.
  • On December 4, prior to the film’s release, the stampede led to the death of a 35-year-old woman.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested on charges of culpable homicide but was granted bail the following day.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has grossed ₹1760 crore globally, becoming a major box office success.
“It was only because of the crowd that had gathered to see the film.” - Boney Kapoor

This incident highlights the dangers of massive fan gatherings and the responsibilities of celebrities in such situations. The ongoing investigation will determine the future implications for Allu Arjun and the cinema industry.

item.title: Game Changer: Two events in two cities in a single day - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Two Events in Two Cities on One Day

Published on Jan 2, 2025 by 123 Telugu

Tollywood star Ram Charan and director Shankar Shanmugam's film, Game Changer, is set for a grand release worldwide on January 10, 2025. The excitement builds with major promotional events planned in two cities on January 4, 2025.

  • The first event will be at PVR Icon, Oberoi Mall, Mumbai.
  • The second event will occur later in Rajahmundry, Andhra Pradesh.
  • Bollywood star Pawan Kalyan will be the chief guest at the Rajahmundry event.
  • The film features an ensemble cast, including Kiara Advani, and music composed by Thaman.
“With sky-high expectations, the film is already the talk of the town.”

As the release date approaches, fans can anticipate an exhilarating buildup to this cinematic spectacle.

item.description:
Payal Rohatgi Opens Up About Abuse from Ex-Boyfriend Rahul Mahajan

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In a shocking revelation, actress Payal Rohatgi has disclosed her experiences of physical abuse by her former boyfriend Rahul Mahajan, claiming he once assaulted her by banging her head against a door.

  • Payal Rohatgi recounts instances of physical abuse during her relationship with Rahul Mahajan.
  • She describes a particular incident where he banged her head against a door.
  • The revelation has raised discussions about domestic violence in relationships.
"Once, he banged my head against the door."

This revelation sheds light on the importance of discussing and addressing domestic violence and supports victims in speaking out about their experiences.

item.title: Buzz: Mahesh Babu-Rajamouli’s SSMB29 to release in two parts - 123telugu
item.description:
Mahesh Babu and Rajamouli's SSMB29 Set to Release in Two Parts

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 10:00 am IST

The highly anticipated film SSMB29, featuring Mahesh Babu and directed by SS Rajamouli, will be released in two parts. The first installment is expected to begin filming in April 2025.

  • SSMB29 will be a two-part franchise with the first part slated for release in 2027 and the second in 2029.
  • The film is budgeted at Rs 1,000 crore, making it Rajamouli’s most ambitious project yet.
  • Rajamouli is in discussions with Hollywood studios for an international release.
  • The film features a soundtrack by Oscar winner MM Keeravani.
“Following RRR’s global success, Rajamouli’s popularity has risen significantly.”

Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project!

item.title: Khushbu Sundar was to be launched in Ram Teri Ganga Maili, but Raj Kapoor replaced her: 'She is herself a kid and...' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
At 14, Khushbu Sundar was cast in Ram Teri Ganga Maili, before Raj Kapoor felt she was too young for the part.

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Khushbu Sundar, a talented actress turned politician, shares her experience of being cast in a notable film at a very young age, only to be replaced by another actress.

  • Khushbu revealed she was initially cast by Raj Kapoor for the film.
  • She was replaced by Mandakini due to concerns over her age.
  • Ram Teri Ganga Maili was a major hit and launched several careers.
“Raj ji said, ‘She is herself a kid, and a baby in her hand won’t look good.’” - Khushbu Sundar

This revelation highlights the challenges faced by young actors in the film industry and the impact of casting decisions on their careers.

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor is a sleeping beauty in boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya's year-end photo dump - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Janhvi Kapoor is a sleeping beauty in boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya's year-end photo dump

Date: Jan 02, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The article discusses Janhvi Kapoor's appearances in her boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya's year-end photo dump, highlighting a particularly candid moment where she is seen sleeping.

  • Janhvi Kapoor features in Shikhar Pahariya's Instagram photo dump.
  • She appears in a candid picture sleeping on a traditional swing.
  • The post was shared on the evening of January 1st, 2025.
  • Shikhar's heartfelt caption includes wishes for wisdom and opportunity in 2025.
  • Other images include leisure activities and traditional settings.
“Grateful for all that I could be, for all that I could see and all that I could do...”

The article captures the charming moments of Janhvi Kapoor amidst her boyfriend's reflections for the New Year, showcasing their relationship and public life in a light-hearted manner.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan Says 'Don't Stop My Revenue' To Soft Drink Endorsement: 'If It's Poisoning People...' | Vira - News18
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan Says 'Don't Stop My Revenue' To Soft Drink Endorsement: 'If It's Poisoning People...'

Date: January 02, 2025 Source: Vira

Shah Rukh Khan recently revisited the controversy surrounding his endorsements of soft drinks, questioning societal logic in targeting celebrities while allowing dangerous products to remain on the market.

  • Khan argued that if soft drinks are genuinely harmful, they should be banned rather than targeting endorsers.
  • He emphasized the hypocrisy of allowing harmful products that generate government revenue.
  • Khan discussed the portrayal of smoking in cinema, urging focus on larger health issues instead.
  • He is set to appear next in Sujoy Ghosh's upcoming film 'King' alongside his daughter, Suhana Khan.
“You’re not stopping certain products if you think they’re harmful, but they’re revenue to the government. Don’t stop my revenue.”

Khan's statements underline the ongoing debate about celebrity endorsements and public health, advocating for transparency and accountability in product regulation.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh Says Samantha Ruth Prabhu Knew About Secret Relationship With Antony: 'Thattil Is Media Shy' - News18
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Says Samantha Ruth Prabhu Knew About Secret Relationship With Antony: 'Thattil Is Media Shy'

Publication Date: January 02, 2025, Source: News18

In a recent interview, actress Keerthy Suresh shared insights into her private relationship with Antony Thattil, revealing that only a few close friends were aware of it. She expressed her surprise at managing to keep it a secret for so long.

  • Keerthy Suresh married Antony Thattil in a private ceremony in Goa in December.
  • Very few industry peers were aware of their relationship, including Samantha Ruth Prabhu and a select few friends.
  • Keerthy feels their relationship's privacy was prioritized, stating that they are not accustomed to public displays of affection.
  • The couple has been together for 15 years, having first met in their teenage years.
  • Despite Antony's wealth as a businessman, he prefers to stay out of the media spotlight.
“I thought it would come out way earlier, but we somehow managed. We both like to keep our personal things as private as possible.”

Their enduring romance has captured fans' hearts, marking a significant new chapter in their lives.

item.title: Meghan Markle returns to Instagram after 5 years, posts first video - The Times of India
item.description:
Meghan Markle Returns to Instagram After 5 Years, Posts First Video

Date: October 2023 | Source: The Times

Meghan Markle has made her comeback to Instagram, posting her first video in five years. This return marks a significant moment for the Duchess of Sussex as she reconnects with her followers.

  • Meghan's first post features a video highlighting some of her recent activities.
  • The video showcases her involvement in various charitable initiatives.
  • The return is seen as a way for her to engage more with the public and share her perspective.
“Excited to share more of my journey with all of you.”

This return to social media could have implications for her public image and influence as a celebrity.

item.title: Netflix accidentally leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ premiere date - 123telugu
item.description:
Netflix Accidentally Leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ Premiere Date

Published on Jan 2, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

The recent leak from Netflix revealed the long-awaited premiere date for ‘Squid Game 3’ as June 27, 2025, generating excitement among fans.

  • Recent season, ‘Squid Game 2’, had over 62 million views but didn't match the success of its predecessor.
  • The leaked release date came from a now-deleted YouTube video by Netflix.
  • There are no new star additions for Season 3, as Netflix dispelled rumors about Leonardo DiCaprio joining the cast.
  • Creators are under pressure to craft innovative games for the new season to recapture the series' initial excitement.
“As fans eagerly await Squid Game 3, all eyes are on how the show will evolve to reclaim its place as a cultural phenomenon.”

This leak has excited fans, but it also raises questions about the series' ability to maintain its momentum and cultural significance.

item.title: Javed Ali reacts to Diljit Dosanjh's comment on India's no-so-good infrastructure for live shows: 'If you - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Javed Ali reacts to Diljit Dosanjh's comment on India's no-so-good infrastructure for live shows: 'If you are respected at home...'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

This article discusses the recent comments made by Diljit Dosanjh regarding India's infrastructure for live shows, where he suggests that improvements are needed for him to continue performing. Javed Ali, responding to this, emphasizes the love and respect artists receive in India.

  • Diljit Dosanjh receives love for his performances during the India leg of his Dil-luminati tour.
  • Dosanjh comments on the inadequate infrastructure for live shows in India and hints at not performing until improvements are made.
  • Javed Ali defends India's concert atmosphere, stating that respect and love for artists are paramount.
  • Diljit ended his tour in Ludhiana, expressing satisfaction despite facing challenges.
“Wherever we go, we receive so much love. In our country, people treat artists with great respect. I don't think such love exists anywhere else.” - Javed Ali

The article highlights contrasting views on India’s music concert infrastructure, with artists expressing the need for improvements while also acknowledging the respect they receive from fans.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 28: Allu Arjun-starrer becomes the second-biggest Indian grosser of all time, beats Baahubali 2’s Rs 1788 cr record - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 28

Date & Source: Published on New Year’s day by Indian Express

The Allu Arjun-starrer Pushpa 2 has crossed the ₹1788 crore worldwide benchmark, surpassing SS Rajamouli’s Baahubali 2, and is now the second-highest Indian grosser.

  • As of January 1, Pushpa 2 collected ₹13.15 crore at the domestic box office.
  • The film’s nett domestic collection stands at ₹1184.65 crore.
  • The Hindi version contributed ₹774.65 crore to the collection.
  • Internationally, Pushpa 2 has a solid run ahead until competitors release in mid-January.
“So far, Aamir Khan’s Dangal is the biggest grosser in the history of Indian cinema at ₹2070 crore.”

Pushpa 2's significant box office success highlights its impact in Indian cinema, especially in comparison to previous record-holders.
